datasets.name: ds_quality_summary
datasets.query: SELECT bronze_last_24h, silver_last_24h, retention_pct_24h, latest_bronze_ingestion, latest_silver_event FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_data_quality_summary

datasets.name: ds_bronze_hourly
datasets.query: SELECT hour, bronze_record_count FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_streaming_ingestion_hourly ORDER BY hour DESC LIMIT 168

datasets.name: ds_silver_hourly
datasets.query: SELECT hour, silver_record_count FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_silver_processed_hourly ORDER BY hour DESC LIMIT 168
